Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Replace String By String in a file (Images\Utils\1.png)

Param.Name: sSourceFilePath
Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sStringNeedToReplace
Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: Customer Name need to configure

Param.Description: Input Amount for Approver Three, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not check this icon - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No mean not check this icon - Yes|No

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Keyword.Name: VerifyAbleApproveOfPaymentInABank
Keyword.Description: Verify one/more payments in A Bank is able to approve or not --> if there are more than one payment with same Payment Number --> verify all (Images\Customer\Payment\58.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: select View Type, null means by pass select, let it default value

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account need to approve payments in it

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber1
Param.Description: Payment Number 1 need to verify, must be two element, separate by semi-colon PAYTAMN00001;AbleApprove|PAYTAMN00001;NotAbleApprove|null, AbleApprove means can approve this payment, NotAbleApprove means can't approve this payment, null means by pass this parameter

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber2
Param.Description: Payment Number 2 need to verify, AbleApprove means can approve this payment, NotAbleApprove means can't approve this payment, null means by pass this parameter

Keyword.Name: SearchInTabApprovals
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Approvals Tab - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\51.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Payments waiting for my approval)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: VerifyApprovalHistoryOfFirstPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Approval History - Comment, Approved, Pending Approval for First Payment File, you need to use keyword SearchInTabApprovals to make sure there is one payment in the result(Images\Customer\Payment\56.png)

Param.Description: Check first Approved, need 2 params, separate by semi-colon ";" - Name;Time - Null means by pass verify Approved

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Keyword.Param: Voucher Number;Invoice Number;Purchase Order;Invoice Date;Invoice Due Date;Gross Amount;Discount Amount;Net Amount

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: VerifyAbleApproveOfPaymentInABank
Keyword.Description: Verify one/more payments in A Bank is able to approve or not --> if there are more than one payment with same Payment Number --> verify all (Images\Customer\Payment\58.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: select View Type, null means by pass select, let it default value

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account need to approve payments in it

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber1
Param.Description: Payment Number 1 need to verify, must be two element, separate by semi-colon PAYTAMN00001;AbleApprove|PAYTAMN00001;NotAbleApprove|null, AbleApprove means can approve this payment, NotAbleApprove means can't approve this payment, null means by pass this parameter

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber2

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Pending Tab - This keyword should use after keyword FilterInPaymentPage - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\16.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment

Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Pending Tab - This keyword should use after keyword FilterInPaymentPage - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\16.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Pending Tab - This keyword should use after keyword FilterInPaymentPage - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\16.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: VerifyAbleApproveOfPaymentInABank
Keyword.Description: Verify one/more payments in A Bank is able to approve or not --> if there are more than one payment with same Payment Number --> verify all (Images\Customer\Payment\58.png)

Param.Description: select View Type, null means by pass select, let it default value

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account need to approve payments in it

Param.Description: Payment Number 1 need to verify, must be two element, separate by semi-colon PAYTAMN00001;AbleApprove|PAYTAMN00001;NotAbleApprove|null, AbleApprove means can approve this payment, NotAbleApprove means can't approve this payment, null means by pass this parameter

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Pending Tab - This keyword should use after keyword FilterInPaymentPage - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\16.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage

Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment

Param.Name: lstValue

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Param.Name: sVar1
Param.Description: Variable 1

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6

Keyword.Name: ConfigureApprovalForACustomer
Keyword.Description: Configure Approval For A Customer (Images\AdminDev\Customer_Management\1.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to configure

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account in Customer need to configure

Param.Name: sCheckEnablePayment
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Enable Payment Approvals, null means by pass check & let it default

Param.Name: sCheckFinalApprover
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Final Approver, null means by pass check & let it default

Param.Name: sApproverOne
Param.Description: Input user for Approver One, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverTwo
Param.Description: Input user for Approver Two, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverThree
Param.Description: Input user for Approver Three, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverTwoAmount
Param.Description: Input Amount for Approver Two, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverThreeAmount
Param.Description: Input Amount for Approver Three, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedUpdate
Param.Description: Expected Update, null means by pass verify Update status

Param.Description: Expected Warning https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not check this icon - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No mean not check this icon - Yes|No

Keyword.Name: SearchInTabApprovals
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Approvals Tab - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\51.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Payments waiting for my approval)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile

Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: SearchInTabApprovals
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Approvals Tab - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\51.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Payments waiting for my approval)

Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Replace String By String in a file (Images\Utils\1.png)

Param.Name: sSourceFilePath
Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sStringNeedToReplace
Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: Customer Name need to configure

Param.Description: Bank Account in Customer need to configure

Param.Name: sCheckEnablePayment
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Enable Payment Approvals, null means by pass check & let it default

Param.Name: sCheckFinalApprover
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Final Approver, null means by pass check & let it default

Param.Name: sApproverOne
Param.Description: Input user for Approver One, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverTwo
Param.Description: Input user for Approver Two, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverThree
Param.Description: Input user for Approver Three, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverTwoAmount
Param.Description: Input Amount for Approver Two, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sApproverThreeAmount
Param.Description: Input Amount for Approver Three, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedUpdate
Param.Description: Expected Update, null means by pass verify Update status

Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClearBeforeSearch(true) means clear all existing search chips before add new search chip

Keyword.Name: DoActionOnAPaymentTabApproval
Keyword.Description: Expand first Bank Account, then click on Button Menu container and select one action based on Payment Number on Approval Tab, this keyword is use after keyword SearchInTabApproval (Images\Customer\Payment\60.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to do action

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action Name

Keyword.Name: VerifyDetailLineOfAPayment
Keyword.Description: Verify Detail Line value of a Payment in Payment Page, this keyword just support verify one detail line, to verify more detail line, use it multiple or using keyword VerifyMultipleDetailLineOfAPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\22.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment number need to verify its Detail Line Value

Param.Name: sDetailLine
Param.Description: number of Detail Line

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method - null means not check

Param.Name: sPaymentDate
Param.Description: Payment Date - null means not check - currentdate() if you need to set current date by format MM/dd/yyyy

Param.Name: lstFieldName
Param.Description: List of column name - number of element is as lstValue - separate with semi-colon ; - null means not check

Param.Name: lstValue
Param.Description: List of value need to check - number of element is as lstValue - equivalent with lstFieldName - separate with semi-colon ; - by pass Dolla Euro sign - null means not check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional - PAYEEID(Arkansas_24814_VENDID) - check PayeeId field FrameworkImages\Payment\29.png

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters
